{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-Level8_1/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-Level8_1/readme","text":"[img height=200 [https://nos.netease.com/ydschool-online/1491037703359Level8_1.jpg]] 此学习包共有 684 个来源于有道考神团队的单词。整合历年专八真题考试中的所有词汇，通过深入研究改革前后历年真题命题规律，对专八真题词汇进行深入分析和研究，统计真实考试场景下必背684个高频词汇。搭配英文释意，帮助考生准确理解词义，满足专八更高需求。用最短的时间考最高的分数，背单词带你搞定专八，快、准、狠！适用于高效学习、基础备考。 可在[[墨屉手册|https://tiddlymemo.org/manual/zh-Hans]]查看安装使用教程。","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki"},"$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-Level8_1/Word":{"title":"$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-Level8_1/Word","code-body":"yes","text":" {{!!word}}<$reveal default={{!!picture}} type="nomatch" text="" animate="yes" >

"},"$:/Level8_1/warranted_100":{"title":"$:/Level8_1/warranted_100","word":"warranted","tags":"?","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-Level8_1/Word}}","created":"20220419132502868","transCn":"adj. （制造商）担保的，保证的
","usphone":"'wɔrənt","phrases":"arrest warrant: 逮捕证
search warrant: ［法］搜查证
","sentences":"Due to the complexity of the compliance domain, an organization is unlikely to undergo successful audits if the required evidence is not readily available or cannot be warranted to be genuine.
^^根据法规遵循域的复杂性，如果不能容易地获取需求证据或是不能保证其真实性，一家企业是不可能成功通过审核的。^^
","relWords":"n.
warranty: 保证；担保；授权；（正当）理由
warrant: 根据；证明；正当理由；委任状
warrantee: 被保证人；被担保人
warranter: 担保人
warrantor: 保证人；担保人

vt.
warrant: 保证；担保；批准；辩解

","synos":"adj.
保证的；担保的：assuring, guarantied
v.
批准（warrant的过去分词）；授权：authorized, confirmed
"},"$:/Level8_1/inference_101":{"title":"$:/Level8_1/inference_101","word":"inference","tags":"?","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-Level8_1/Word}}","created":"20220419132502869","transCn":"n. 推理； 推断

deductive inference: 演绎推理

","sentences":"There were two inferences to be drawn from her letter.
^^从她的来信可以得到两种推论。^^
","relWords":"adj.
inferential: 推理的；推论的；根据推理的

","synos":"n.

^^这含义是您可能需要追踪对您的过程进行的所有的变更，您为什么进行每个变更的原因，以及为了遵守这些法规，什么时候进行的变更。^^
","relWords":"adj.
implicit: 含蓄的；暗示的；盲从的

n.

v.

vt.

an intimate relationship

","sentences":"The flies leave a sticky residue on crops.
^^苍蝇在庄稼上留下黏糊糊的分泌物。^^
Rinse off any soap residue.
^^冲净残留的肥皂。^^
","relWords":"adj.

","usphone":"'tæktɪks","sentences":"Of course I wonder if happiness tactics that come from someone elsecan ever stick.
^^当然我怀疑来自与某人的快乐策略是否对其他人有用。^^
I think it will also point to areas where we can do better and can make improvements in our strategy and tactics," he said.
^^我认为，报告还会指出在哪些领域我们能够做得更好，还有我们可以在哪些领域提高我们的策略和战术。^^
","relWords":"adj.

","usphone":"prə'ponənt","sentences":"Halsey was identified as a leading proponent of the values of progressive education.

proposal: 提议，建议；求婚

","usphone":"siŋk","sentences":"By using a Recovery Protocol, we can stay in synch with our overall vision, values, and goals during the rough times.
^^通过利用恢复协议，在艰难时期，我们可以与我们整个的视界、价值和目标保持同步。^^
If it becomes clear that your systems' times are not in synch, then I suggest you look into the various means available to you for synchronizing them (see Resources for a link).
^^如果明显看出系统的时间不同步，那么我建议您研究一下可用于同步它们的各种可用途径（请参阅 参考资料以获得链接）。^^
","synos":"n.
同时，同步：same time, real time
"},"$:/Level8_1/platitude_113":{"title":"$:/Level8_1/platitude_113","word":"platitude","tags":"?","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-Level8_1/Word}}","created":"20220419132502871","transCn":"n. 陈词滥调
","usphone":"'plætɪtud","sentences":"His excuse was the platitude ‘boys will be boys.’

","usphone":"'tɪd'bɪt","sentences":"On Fleet Street, we call it “the mass doorstep” when a crowd of reporters will wait and wait for hours in hope of a tidbit of news on a developing story.

","synos":"n.

","usphone":"'fi:əlti","sentences":"When they act with predictability, restraint, and fealty to the rule of law, ordinary people gain faith in their government.
